name: UICellConfigurationState
desc: A structure that encapsulates a cell’s state.

items.name: var traitCollection: UITraitCollection
items.desc: The traits that describe the current layout environment of the view, such as the user interface style and layout direction.

items.name: var isSelected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in a selected state.

items.name: var isHighlighted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in a highlighted state.

items.name: var isFocused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in a focused state.

items.name: var isDisabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in a disabled state.

items.name: var isPinned: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view is in a pinned state.

items.name: subscript(UIConfigurationStateCustomKey) -> AnyHashable?
items.desc: Accesses custom states by key.

items.name: var isEditing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in editing mode.

items.name: var isSwiped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in a swiped state.

items.name: var isExpanded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in an expanded state, such as in an outline.

items.name: var isReordering: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is reordering.

items.name: var cellDragState: UICellConfigurationState.DragState
items.desc: The cell’s drag state.

items.name: var cellDropState: UICellConfigurationState.DropState
items.desc: The cell’s drop state.

items.name: enum UICellConfigurationState.DragState
items.desc: Constants that describe the cell’s drag state.

items.name: enum UICellConfigurationState.DropState
items.desc: Constants that describe the cell’s drop state.

items.name: init(traitCollection: UITraitCollection)
items.desc: Creates a cell configuration state with the specified trait collection.

items.name: static func != (UICellConfigurationState, UICellConfigurationState) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two cell configuration states are equal.

items.name: static func == (UICellConfigurationState, UICellConfigurationState) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two cell configuration states are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the cell configuration state by feeding them into the hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.
